name: Dark Ball Maze
description:
This is a project started in 28/11/2016

At the moment is only in Spanish but is easy to learn how to play

Trying to keep it going
Made in Unity

20/12/2916 Update: We are back, updated to 5.5.0f3 Unity version, fixed errors for the unity update, changed victory sound, changed player physics for jumps.

08/12/2016 Update: Better Menu, Sphere Selector, Level Selector, Cristals of the player with the same light color of the player and improvised performance, Changed Cursor, Cursor config imporvised, Changed player settings configuracion.

07/12/2016 Update: Menu Changed, Better Script, Lights for the player.
PD: Less Updates for 1-2 week, need to study (Finals)

04/12/2016 Fixed: Portal bug

03/12/2016 Update: Add: Models for Button and Portal(With better effects)

02/12/2016 Update: Test room add: Portal Teleport and Platforms activated by Buttons
